title: Glottography dataset derived from Hochstetler et al. 2004 "Sociolinguistic survey of the Dogon language area"
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Hochstetler, J Lee & Evelin IK Durieux Jude A and Durieux-Boon. 2004. Sociolinguistic survey of the Dogon language area. SIL International. Citeseer.
